text: Madrasta (International title: A Place in Your Heart / ) is a 2019 Philippine drama television series broadcast by GMA Network. The series aired on the network's Afternoon Prime line up and worldwide on GMA Pinoy TV from October 7, 2019 to February 21, 2020, replacing Dahil sa Pag-ibig. ==Series overview== ==Episodes== ==References== Category:Lists of Philippine drama television series episodes
title: List of Madrasta episodes
